entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published windows forms application complains about missing runtime on windows 11 #106579
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces does not work correctly on some iOS devices #106577
  • Native AOT Binaries still depend on libz.so #106566
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Add `JsonElement.GetPropertyCount()` #104692
    10.0.0
  • Update .NET Linux Build for .NET 9 #91826
    9.0.0
  • PInvoke Source generation stops after first method with `global using` #94150
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!(checkUnusedValues && def->IsUnusedValue()) && "operands should never be marked as unused values"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #106480
    9.0.0
  • Debugger shows incorrect local variable values following an exception #106467
  • Port System.Reflection docs for .NET 9 APIs #105982
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround for #106521 #106578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106576
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Blittable color #106575
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-rc1] JIT: fix unused operand marking in LowerHWIntrinsicTernaryLogic #106574
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include libz.a in native aot packages #106569
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove legacy APIs for MCG support #106568
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106503
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix unused operand marking in LowerHWIntrinsicTernaryLogic #106555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove managed interfaces impls defined in CoreCLR #105965
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass structs containing empty struct arrays according to integer calling convention #106266
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use ProjectReferences in inbox src projects #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • Add Base64Url fuzzer #106509
    area-System.Buffers
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Emitting more push instructions based on the push size #106516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106511
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2517651 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Adjust the vector docs to use langword instead of cref to preserve generic type information where relevant #106561
    area-System.Numerics
